Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web

Class BaseWebLoadBalancer

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.geoweb.web.BaseWebLoadBalancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILoadBalancer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompressLoadBalancer, SimpleWebLoadBalancer
public abstract class BaseWebLoadBalancer extends Object implements ILoadBalancer
Common functionality of load balancers.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseWebLoadBalancer

      public BaseWebLoadBalancer(long appId, String ip, List<HddVm> appServers, IDBBalancer dbBalancer)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      appId - - the id of the applications, which this load balancer is serving.
      ip - - the IP address represented in a standard Ipv4 or IPv6 dot notation.
      appServers - - the application servers. Must not be null.
      dbBalancer - - the balancer of the DB cloudlets among DB servers. Must not be null.
